description: Sakuya is the only human living in the Scarlet Devil Mansion, yet she is also the head maid. Though she looks about sixteen like the other girls, Sakuya has the ability to slow, stop and possibly reverse time. She seems to have been serving Remilia for a long time and may be far older than she looks. Her talents are cooking, knife throwing and time manipulation.
name: Izayoi Sakuya
